GSD.product_version: versions from v5.8 to before v5.10.70
GSD.description:
net/smc: fix 'workqueue leaked lock' in smc_conn_abort_work

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.70 by commit b4561bd29e62b24b245a53391e64b6880f0792cc, it was introduced in version v5.8 by commit b286a0651e4404ab96cdfdcdad8a839a26b3751e. For more details please see the references link.
